channel.title: rendering on Portfolio
channel.description: Recent content in rendering on Portfolio

item.title: Image Sythesis and animation
item.description: In this three-person project we created : A rendering process using advanced techniques such as : Ray-tracing Shadow mapping Alterative rendering (refining render to create a first render faster) Animation rendering. We could load a bvh model and use its data to animate a skeleton, rendered by our previously created rendering model.
